title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 358/89 of 13 February 1989 reintroducing the preferential customs duty on imports of large-flowered roses originating in Morocco
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 358/89
of 13 February 1989
reintroducing the preferential customs duty on imports of large-flowered roses originating in Morocco
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For imports of large-flowered roses (CN code ex 0603 10 51) originating in Morocco the preferential customs duty set by Regulation (EEC) No 3552/88 is reintroduced with effect from 14 February 1989.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 14 February 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
